channel.title: Do not trade with Solemn Wishes for the time being - hacked
channel.description:
hi, Well Solemn Wishes mopar account has been hacked by some sad sad person.....change his details ect ect. He has been selling solemns script and even had the cheek to increase the price! as you may of noticed. lol its a big like starblaster, the guy who scams for him script...the scammers email is rune.nation@gmail.com as appose to solemns which is rune-nation@hotmail.co.uk.
I tried logging in a few days ago lol, some barstard has changed the email and everything lol....if i wasnt soo busy with school i would of nitced sooner lol......Well hes atleast sold it to 5 people so i am kinda pissed off....id rather it be free then for some gay runescape addict to have it lmao.
anyway just dont trade him till this is sorted out please, and whoever this person is is very very sad :) please express the way you think of what he has done here. Its even worste cos solemn is a nice guy...
